title: Hobby preferences
description: How you approach hobbies and side projects. These answers gently tilt your archetype balance.

questions.text: I’m the one who rallies people—planning meetups, booking courts, starting group chats.
questions.question_text: I’m the one who rallies people—planning meetups, booking courts, starting group chats.

questions.text: How often do you personally kick off a new hobby session or group activity?
questions.question_text: How often do you personally kick off a new hobby session or group activity?

questions.text: I add playful structure (timers, dares, mini-games) to keep things lively.
questions.question_text: I add playful structure (timers, dares, mini-games) to keep things lively.

questions.text: Newness energizes me—I’m excited to sample fresh skills, places, or styles.
questions.question_text: Newness energizes me—I’m excited to sample fresh skills, places, or styles.

questions.text: How often do you rotate in a brand-new hobby or class?
questions.question_text: How often do you rotate in a brand-new hobby or class?

questions.text: I like building micro-adventures (new routes, side quests) into ordinary weeks.
questions.question_text: I like building micro-adventures (new routes, side quests) into ordinary weeks.

questions.text: I’d rather go deep in a few hobbies than dabble in many.
questions.question_text: I’d rather go deep in a few hobbies than dabble in many.

questions.text: How satisfying are steady routines and long-term practice in your hobbies?
questions.question_text: How satisfying are steady routines and long-term practice in your hobbies?

questions.text: I keep my kits/gear prepped so it’s easy to start and follow through.
questions.question_text: I keep my kits/gear prepped so it’s easy to start and follow through.

questions.text: Competitive or high-challenge environments push me to bring my best.
questions.question_text: Competitive or high-challenge environments push me to bring my best.

questions.text: How motivated are you by measurable progress (PRs, leaderboards, time trials)?
questions.question_text: How motivated are you by measurable progress (PRs, leaderboards, time trials)?

questions.text: I enjoy setting standards or leading drills when we practice together.
questions.question_text: I enjoy setting standards or leading drills when we practice together.

questions.text: I care about craft and refinement—good tools, technique, and elevating the experience.
questions.question_text: I care about craft and refinement—good tools, technique, and elevating the experience.

questions.text: I’m willing to invest time and resources to improve quality in my hobbies.
questions.question_text: I’m willing to invest time and resources to improve quality in my hobbies.

questions.text: How often do you maintain, upgrade, or carefully store your gear?
questions.question_text: How often do you maintain, upgrade, or carefully store your gear?

questions.text: I naturally analyze my hobbies—breaking skills into systems, patterns, and practice plans.
questions.question_text: I naturally analyze my hobbies—breaking skills into systems, patterns, and practice plans.

questions.text: How often do you track progress (logs, spreadsheets, stats) for a hobby?
questions.question_text: How often do you track progress (logs, spreadsheets, stats) for a hobby?

questions.text: I like teaching or explaining frameworks I’ve discovered to other people.
questions.question_text: I like teaching or explaining frameworks I’ve discovered to other people.

questions.text: I like remixing hobbies—combining ideas from different fields to create something new.
questions.question_text: I like remixing hobbies—combining ideas from different fields to create something new.

questions.text: I often tweak rules, setups, or gear until they fit my vision.
questions.question_text: I often tweak rules, setups, or gear until they fit my vision.

questions.text: How often do you create small rituals or tokens around a hobby?
